description: Kaiba Seto is the majority shareholder and President of his own multi-national company, KaibaCorp, who aims to become the world`s greatest player of the Duel Monsters card game. To accomplish this goal, he must defeat his arch-rival, Mutou Yuugi. He is largely considered an anti-hero, as his motives are usually ego-centric, but in several cases towards a good cause.
name: Kaiba Seto
